content: Yes, Bali has an international airport called Ngurah Rai International Airport, also known as Denpasar International Airport. It is located in the southern part of Bali, near the town of Tuban and the resort area of Kuta. The airport serves as a hub for several airlines, including Garuda Indonesia, Lion Air, and AirAsia, and it offers direct flights to and from numerous international destinations, including Australia, Asia, the Middle East, and Europe.
